name: Attack of the Plutonians
description:
HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?

A story about a geeky 38-year-old guy who wants to save the world at any cost (and also have his revenge as Aliens cut out the energy, and has no means to play anymore), finds himself without guns, or backup, or anything really.

Just some tools, and a....chicken gun?

For the first time, he will put to the test his massive abilities in combat, and survival. (Learned from years of gaming, that is)

Let the battle for earth begin...and maybe, when it ends, he can finally get a girlfriend...or a job at least!.

(take a bath, maybe?)

How to play with Keyboard and Mouse:

WASD - Move.
Space - Jump.
Double space - Double Jump!
Shift - Run.
S - Jump down the plataform.
P - Pause.
Mouse - Aim.
Click - Shoot and destroy Aliens!.

Don't forget to pick up the Snes Cartridge!

AND REMEMBER, SURVIVE AS LONG AS YOU CAN!!

Made by One Island Team:

Graphic Designer: Sergio Rodriguez @MrOrangeEF
Concept Artist: Barbara D'Aversa @barbaradaversa
Animation Artist: Federico Boero @k4lindor
Programming: Juan Manuel García @ByCross028
Music: German Tello @GermanTmusica

Game for #indiesvsgamers

http://facebook.com/oneislandcompany
